name: Outside The Room: The Second Idiom Awareness Game
name_original: Outside The Room: The Second Idiom Awareness Game
description:
More literal idioms as we step Outside The Room in the next installment. Made in Bitsy Game Maker, and using a 3 tone colour palette, this game is full of interesting translations of confusing idioms and sayings. Some brand new ones are in there, as well as some old favourites from the first Idiom Awareness Game I made.

This was made for #1GAM April 2018.
